text: Marcos Rodolfo Ferrufino Pérez (25 April 1963 – 25 June 2021) was a Bolivian football manager and player. He played as a defender. He played for the Bolivia national football team, making nine appearances between 1989 until 1991. Ferrufino died on 25 June 2021 aged 58 in his hometown Oruro from COVID-19 amid the COVID-19 pandemic in Bolivia. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bolivia Category:Bolivian footballers Category:Bolivian football managers
